com.mysql.fabric

Class ShardIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mysql.fabric.ShardIndex

  • public class ShardIndex
extends java.lang.Object
    A shard index represents the physical location of a segment of data. The data segment is identified by it's key's relation to the `bound' value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShardIndex(java.lang.String bound, java.lang.Integer shardId, java.lang.String groupName) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBound()
      The bound that the key will be compared to.
      java.lang.String getGroupName()
      The name of the group in the data for this shard resides.
      java.lang.Integer getShardId()
      A unique identified for this shard.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getBound

        public java.lang.String getBound()
        The bound that the key will be compared to. This is treated different based on the ShardingType.

      • getShardId

        public java.lang.Integer getShardId()
        A unique identified for this shard.

      • getGroupName

        public java.lang.String getGroupName()
        The name of the group in the data for this shard resides.
